) } const App = () => { const [notes, setNotes] = useState([ { id: 1, content: 'HTML is easy', important: true, user: 'Matti Luukkainen', }, { id: 2, content: 'Browser can execute only JavaScript', important: false, user: 'Matti Luukkainen', }, { id: 3, content: 'Most important methods of HTTP-protocol are GET and POST', important: true, user: 'Arto Hellas', }, ]) const [user, setUser] = useState(null) const [message, setMessage] = useState(null) const login = (user) => { setUser(user) setMessage(`welcome ${user}`) setTimeout(() => { setMessage(null) }, 10000) } const match = useMatch('/notes/:id') const note = match ? notes.find((note) => note.id === Number(match.params.id)) : null const padding = { padding: 5, } return ( {message && {message}}
